channel.title: Accessing redash
channel.description:
Hello,
I installed redash on one of the machines in my environment, how can I access it from another machine? Both of the machines are running under the same network and accessible to each other.
How can i get redash to be open for calls from other machines under the same network? <machine's_ip>:5000 doesn't work. Do i need to change some configs?
Thank you.

item.title: Accessing redash
item.dc:creator: redash_raj
item.description:
Hi how did you change ip adress from 0.0.0.0 to machine ip adress.
im also stuck here in this process and need help

Read full topic

item.title: Accessing redash
item.dc:creator: workey
item.description:
I changed the ngix port and it worked, port 80 was taken already.

Thanks

Read full topic
